workout_plans.name: Beginner
workout_plans.veg_diet: Include plenty of fruits and vegetables.
workout_plans.non_veg_diet: Lean protein sources like chicken or fish are recommended.

workout_plans.name: Intermediate
workout_plans.veg_diet: Consume more plant-based protein sources like tofu or beans.
workout_plans.non_veg_diet: Incorporate lean meat and fish for protein.
